item.title: [Procedure]AWalk3
item.dc:creator: @Avaphi Avaphi
item.description:
@Avaphi wrote:

This script will most likley live forever because it doesnt rely on colors at all, just the simple angle and degrees of a circle, and if it is implemented with the Srl function MakeCompass(direction: String); It will work perfectly, Finally here it is, AWalk3:

Procedure AWalk3(Degree, Radius : Integer); //Help from starblaster100 Var Ax, Ay : Integer; begin If (Radius > 57) then Radius := 57; Ax := Round ( Radius * Sin (Degree * Pi / 180)) + 648; Ay := Round (- Radius * Cos (Degree * Pi / 180)) + 83; Mouse(Ax, Ay, 0, 0, True); end;

Read full topic
